Rodrigo Nascentes

It's all about data, code and life.

Hi, I'm Rodrigo Nascentes. I'm a database engineer and am always looking to automate manual tasks to make the DBA life easier. I am a confirmed nerd, an avid scuba diver, a volleyball player and a fabulous barbecue cook. I live in Porto Alegre, RS, Brasil with my wife and my daughter.

I created sp_who3 an open source alternative to the sp_who for SQL Server.

I use Twitter a lot but I not always speak about technology, my account is @ronascentes. I mostly tweet in Portuguese.
